name: ElevenLabs
description:
ElevenLabs is a leading AI-powered voice synthesis platform built for creators, studios and businesses that need lifelike audio. It uses advanced deep-learning models to generate expressive, natural-sounding speech in dozens of languages.

With real-time responsiveness, emotional control and industry-leading voice cloning, ElevenLabs has become a go-to solution for podcasters, filmmakers, game studios and educators seeking high-quality narration without recording equipment.

The platform combines accessibility with professional fidelity, offering beginner-friendly browser tools alongside a powerful API for developers.
subtitle: AI voice and speech synthesis for creators.
features: Realistic voice generation with human-like timbre

use_cases.title: Podcast Production
use_cases.description: Creators can generate narrations, intros, ads, or full episodes using natural-sounding voices. ElevenLabs helps speed up workflow and reduce costly studio sessions.

use_cases.title: Video Narration & YouTube
use_cases.description: YouTubers can produce high-quality narration in multiple voices and languages, enabling faster content creation and consistency without needing to record audio manually.

use_cases.title: Character Voices for Games
use_cases.description: Indie and professional game developers can quickly prototype characters using unique AI-generated voice profiles, complete with emotions and dynamic tone.

pricing: Free plan available — paid plans start at $5/mo

name: Adobe Podcast
description:
Adobe Podcast is an AI-powered audio platform that helps anyone create clean, clear and professional-sounding voice recordings. Even if you only have a laptop microphone, its tools automatically remove background noise, fix unclear speech and improve overall clarity so your audio sounds polished.

The platform focuses on simplicity. Instead of using a complex timeline, you can edit your audio through a text transcript, which makes it easy to remove mistakes or rearrange content. Features like automatic volume leveling, remote guest recording and smart cleanup tools help creators save time and avoid the frustrations of traditional audio editing.

Adobe Podcast is ideal for podcasters, educators, marketers and anyone who needs high quality voice content without expensive studio gear. Whether you are recording interviews, lessons or voiceovers, the platform helps you sound confident and professional with minimal effort.
subtitle: AI-enhanced audio cleanup and podcast production tools.
features: AI speech enhancement for studio-quality audio

use_cases.title: Podcast Editing
use_cases.description: Creators can remove background noise, clean up poorly recorded audio and edit episodes using the text-based editor to save hours of manual work.

use_cases.title: Remote Interviews
use_cases.description: Hosts can record high-quality audio from guests anywhere and apply AI enhancement to ensure consistent sound across all voices.

use_cases.title: Marketing & Business Audio
use_cases.description: Teams can generate clean voiceovers for ads, tutorials and corporate content without needing professional studio equipment.

pricing: Included with Adobe Creative Cloud — Enhance Speech has a free tier.

name: Cleanvoice AI
description:
Cleanvoice AI is designed to clean up voice recordings quickly and automatically, which makes it perfect for creators who want smooth and professional audio without learning complicated editing tools. The platform removes filler words like “um” and “uh”, takes out mouth noises, reduces background sounds and smooths over awkward silences so your recordings feel natural and polished.

The tool is especially helpful for people who speak freely on camera or in podcasts. Instead of spending hours removing small mistakes by hand, Cleanvoice does the work for you, making the editing process fast and stress free. You simply upload your audio and receive a cleaner version ready for publishing.

Cleanvoice is a great fit for podcasters, YouTubers, interviewers and educators who want clear voice content that is easy to listen to. It helps your message stand out by removing distractions and delivering a crisp final result.
subtitle: Automatic audio cleanup powered by AI.

use_cases.title: Podcast Post-Production
use_cases.description: Speeds up editing by automatically removing ums, ahs, lip smacks and awkward pauses for a professional, smooth final cut.

use_cases.title: Voiceover Optimization
use_cases.description: Creators can polish narration for YouTube, audiobooks, or corporate training without manual audio engineering.

use_cases.title: Interview Cleanup
use_cases.description: Multi-speaker recordings become clearer by eliminating distractions such as background noise or verbal tics.

pricing: Pay-as-you-go and subscription plans available from €10/month.

name: Resemble AI
description:
Resemble AI helps creators and businesses generate realistic synthetic voices that can express emotion and speak in multiple languages. The platform allows you to clone your own voice or create entirely new voice profiles that sound natural and engaging, which makes it ideal for storytelling, branding and interactive applications.

Resemble keeps the process simple. Users can upload a small set of recordings or choose from existing voice styles, then type or upload text to instantly generate lifelike speech. The voices can be calm, energetic, dramatic or anything in between, depending on the tone you choose.

The tool is a strong option for studios, game developers, marketers and creators who want unique and expressive voice content without relying on constant manual recording. Whether you are building characters, producing ads or designing an AI assistant, Resemble AI makes it easy to bring your audio to life.
subtitle: Custom voice cloning and AI speech generation.

use_cases.title: Brand Voice Development
use_cases.description: Companies can create consistent, recognizable synthetic voices for advertisements, virtual agents, and branded experiences.

use_cases.title: Character Voice Creation
use_cases.description: Game studios and filmmakers generate unique voices for characters without hiring multiple voice actors.

use_cases.title: AI Assistants & IVR Systems
use_cases.description: Businesses enhance customer support systems with expressive, natural-sounding automated voices.

pricing: Usage-based pricing with custom enterprise plans.

name: Podcastle AI
description:
Podcastle AI is an all-in-one platform for creating, editing and publishing podcasts without needing advanced audio skills. The platform offers high quality recording tools, AI voice cleanup, easy multitrack editing and natural text-to-speech voices, which means anyone can produce a full podcast episode straight from their browser.

One of its biggest strengths is simplicity. Podcastle lets you record guests remotely, edit audio by modifying the transcript and enhance your voice automatically with built-in AI tools. This helps creators focus on storytelling without worrying about complicated software or equipment.

Podcastle is perfect for beginners and professionals who want an organised workflow for interviews, solo episodes or scripted content. With its mix of easy editing tools and powerful AI features, it helps you produce consistent, polished audio every time.
subtitle: All-in-one AI platform for podcast creation.

use_cases.title: Podcast Recording
use_cases.description: Record clear audio locally or remotely with guest links and then enhance the quality using built-in AI tools.

use_cases.title: Script-to-Audio Production
use_cases.description: Convert written scripts into natural-sounding AI narration for episodes, intros or ads.

use_cases.title: Transcript Editing
use_cases.description: Edit your podcast by modifying the transcript — changes automatically update the audio timeline.

pricing: Free plan available — paid plans start at $14.99/month.

name: ChatGPT
description:
ChatGPT is an AI assistant that helps people write, learn, brainstorm and solve problems through natural conversation. It can explain ideas clearly, generate content in many different styles and help users think through tasks step by step. Whether you are working on a school project, planning a trip or writing a piece of content, ChatGPT is designed to make the process easier.

The tool is also helpful for developers and learners. It can write code, fix errors and explain programming concepts in simple terms, which makes it a helpful companion for both beginners and experienced professionals. ChatGPT can break down complex topics into easy explanations and provide examples to help you understand new skills.

Many people use ChatGPT for everyday tasks like drafting emails, summarising documents or coming up with ideas for creative projects. It is flexible, friendly and designed to support anyone who wants to work faster and understand things more clearly.
subtitle: AI assistant for writing, coding, learning and creativity.

use_cases.title: Writing & Editing
use_cases.description: Draft emails, essays, articles or scripts with AI-assisted phrasing, idea generation and proofreading.

use_cases.title: Coding Assistance
use_cases.description: Generate functions, fix errors, explain code concepts or build small applications in multiple languages.

use_cases.title: Learning & Research
use_cases.description: Get step-by-step explanations, study help, summaries and insights across academic subjects.

pricing: Free version available — paid plans start at $20/month.

name: Google Gemini
description:
Google Gemini is a smart AI assistant that can understand text, images and ideas to help you work more efficiently. It is designed to handle a wide range of everyday tasks, from answering questions and explaining concepts to helping with writing and generating creative ideas. Because it connects with the Google ecosystem, it can support schoolwork, research and planning in a simple and intuitive way.

Gemini also includes helpful tools for developers and problem solvers. It can write code, suggest improvements and walk you through technical topics in clear language. People who need support with data or documents can use Gemini to analyse content, uncover insights and break down information into easy-to-understand summaries.

Whether you are creating content, studying for exams or exploring new ideas, Google Gemini provides a flexible and friendly experience that helps you work faster and think more clearly. Its multimodal design makes it a useful assistant for both everyday tasks and more complex projects.
subtitle: Google’s multimodal AI for productivity and creativity.

use_cases.title: Data & Research Assistance
use_cases.description: Summarizes sources, analyzes data, and explains complex concepts using multimodal context.

use_cases.title: Coding & App Prototyping
use_cases.description: Helps developers build scripts, fix bugs and design prototypes faster across multiple languages.

use_cases.title: Content & Creative Writing
use_cases.description: Generates stories, posts, marketing copy and brainstorming ideas adapted to user tone.

pricing: Free plan available — Gemini Advanced subscription from $19.99/month.

information.label: API
information.value: Gemini API available via Google AI Studio

name: Meta AI
description:
Meta AI is a conversational assistant built into popular Meta platforms, which makes it easy for people to get help while browsing or chatting with friends. It can answer questions, explain topics, help with writing and generate creative ideas, all in a simple and approachable way. Because it is integrated into apps people already use, Meta AI is accessible at any moment without needing special tools.

The assistant can also create images and help brainstorm content, making it popular with social media users who want to design posts, captions or messages quickly. For learners, Meta AI provides step-by-step explanations and clear answers that make new topics easier to understand.

Meta AI is a convenient choice for anyone who wants quick support while messaging, posting or exploring ideas. It is designed to help improve conversations and make everyday tasks feel smoother and more enjoyable.
subtitle: Conversational assistant available across Meta platforms.

use_cases.title: Everyday Q&A
use_cases.description: Ask for definitions, advice, explanations or quick knowledge without searching manually.

use_cases.title: Content Creation
use_cases.description: Generate posts, captions, messages and creative writing instantly.

use_cases.title: Learning & Tutoring
use_cases.description: Get help with homework, concepts or step-by-step explanations inside social apps.

pricing: Free for Meta platform users.

name: Perplexity
description:
Perplexity is an AI search assistant that helps people find accurate information quickly and understand it clearly. Instead of giving long lists of links, Perplexity reads online sources for you and then provides a simple answer with citations. This makes it especially useful for people who want trustworthy information without spending time digging through pages.

The platform is designed to make research easy for everyone. You can ask questions in everyday language and Perplexity will summarise the most important points, highlight key facts and show where the information came from. Students, professionals and curious learners enjoy how fast and clear the answers are.

Perplexity is ideal for anyone who needs a reliable way to explore new topics, check facts or learn quickly. Its mix of accuracy and simplicity makes it an excellent tool for studying, researching or understanding subjects at a deeper level.
subtitle: AI-powered search assistant with real-time citations.

use_cases.title: Research Summaries
use_cases.description: Find accurate, up-to-date answers with clear citations pulled directly from trusted sources.

use_cases.title: Academic Work
use_cases.description: Students and researchers can analyze documents, extract insights and understand complex topics faster.

use_cases.title: Market & Industry Analysis
use_cases.description: Professionals can get high-level breakdowns of trends, companies or technologies with sourced data.

pricing: Free plan available — Perplexity Pro starts at $20/month.

name: Claude
description:
Claude is an AI assistant created to help people write, think and analyse information with confidence. It is known for producing clear and thoughtful responses, which makes it helpful for writing projects, detailed explanations and everyday problem solving. Claude can handle complex tasks but always communicates in a simple and human-friendly way.

The assistant is also useful for professionals and students who work with long documents. Claude can read large amounts of text, summarise the key ideas and help you understand the information more easily. Developers can use Claude to generate code, review logic and explore technical topics with clear explanations.

Claude is a strong choice for anyone who values accuracy and careful reasoning. It supports writing, planning, creativity and critical thinking, which makes it a reliable partner for both personal and professional tasks.
subtitle: Safe, reliable AI assistant for writing and reasoning.
features: Large context window for long documents

use_cases.title: Professional Writing
use_cases.description: Create polished reports, articles, business plans and structured documents with clarity and precision.

use_cases.title: Complex Analysis
use_cases.description: Claude can evaluate long documents, contracts or datasets and deliver accurate structured insights.

use_cases.title: Code Help
use_cases.description: Generate functions, fix bugs and explain logic with safe, structured reasoning.

pricing: Free version available — Claude Pro starts at $20/month.

name: Codex AI
description:
Codex AI is designed to help people write code by turning everyday language into working programs. You can describe what you want to build and Codex will generate the code, explain how it works and suggest improvements. This makes it a helpful tool for beginners learning to program and for developers who want to work more efficiently.

The platform can also assist with debugging. If something is not working, you can paste your code into Codex and receive clear guidance on what went wrong and how to fix it. It supports many popular programming languages, which makes it flexible for different projects and skill levels.

Codex is a great partner for building small tools, learning programming or speeding up development tasks. It reduces the time spent on repetitive work and helps users focus on the creative and problem solving parts of coding.
subtitle: AI model that converts natural language into code.

use_cases.title: Accelerated Development
use_cases.description: Write functions or small modules faster by describing the logic in plain language.

use_cases.title: Code Learning
use_cases.description: Beginners can ask for explanations, examples and clarifications across many programming languages.

use_cases.title: Automated Testing
use_cases.description: Codex can generate test cases and basic QA coverage to support engineering workflows.

pricing: Pay-as-you-go via OpenAI API.

name: Qodo
description:
Qodo is an AI tool that helps developers create strong and reliable software by generating intelligent test cases and reviewing code for potential issues. It looks for mistakes and weaknesses that are easy to overlook, then provides clear suggestions that help improve the overall quality of your project.

The platform works smoothly within common development workflows. You can send Qodo a piece of code and receive readable feedback that highlights risks and offers safer alternatives. It is especially useful for teams that want to increase test coverage or maintain consistent code standards without spending hours writing tests by hand.

Qodo is ideal for developers who want clean, dependable code and a faster testing process. It gives you confidence in your work and helps you catch issues early so your software stays stable and efficient.
subtitle: AI tool for automated test generation and code quality.

use_cases.title: Test Creation
use_cases.description: Automatically generate test cases to improve coverage and reduce manual QA workloads.

use_cases.title: Code Review Assistance
use_cases.description: Identify risks, logic issues and potential bugs early in the development cycle.

use_cases.title: Continuous Integration Quality
use_cases.description: Integrate Qodo into pipelines to enforce consistent code quality standards.

pricing: Professional and enterprise plans available.

name: Stitch
description:
Stitch is a Google Labs experiment that turns natural language prompts and visual references into production-ready user interfaces.

Powered by Gemini, Stitch lets designers and developers describe an interface in plain English or upload wireframes and screenshots. The tool then generates responsive layouts, UI components and front-end code for web or mobile in minutes.

By combining AI-assisted design with code export, Stitch helps teams move from idea to interactive prototype faster, reducing repetitive layout work and improving collaboration between product, design and engineering.
subtitle: Google’s AI tool for turning ideas into UI and frontend code.
features: Generate multi-screen web and mobile UIs from natural language prompts
Accepts image, sketch or wireframe references to guide layout and style
Exports responsive front-end code for faster developer handoff
Supports multiple variants to explore different layouts, themes and flows
Browser-based Google Labs experiment with tight design–dev feedback loop

use_cases.title: Rapid Product UI Prototyping
use_cases.description: Turn early-stage product ideas into concrete interface concepts in minutes instead of days, exploring different layouts and flows without manually redrawing screens.

use_cases.title: Design-to-Development Handoff
use_cases.description: Generate structured front-end code that developers can refine instead of rebuilding UIs from scratch, reducing miscommunication between design mocks and implementation.

use_cases.title: Exploring Alternative Design Directions
use_cases.description: Use prompts and reference images to explore multiple design directions quickly, helping teams compare options for visual style, hierarchy and UX before committing.

pricing: Currently free as an experimental Google Labs tool (subject to change).

information.label: Type
information.value: AI UI design & frontend code generator

information.label: Privacy
information.value: Uses Google account & standard Google privacy controls

information.label: API
information.value: No public API — accessed via web interface only

name: Blackbox AI
description:
Blackbox AI is a full-stack coding assistant that combines code search, autocompletion, multi-agent workflows and an API for advanced automation.

Developers can use Blackbox AI in the browser, IDEs and terminals to autocomplete functions, explain snippets, refactor code and generate boilerplate across hundreds of languages and frameworks. Its agents can read entire repositories, run tasks, and suggest fixes in context.

For teams and tool builders, Blackbox AI also exposes a multi-agent API, letting you integrate its capabilities into your own products or internal tools for automated refactoring, QA and documentation.
subtitle: Multi-agent AI coding assistant for search, completion and automation.
features: Real-time code autocompletion and generation across major languages and frameworks
Semantic code search across files, repositories and even code shown in videos
Multi-agent coding workflows for refactoring, documentation and feature implementation
Integrations with popular IDEs and CLIs for in-context assistance
Unified API to access top LLMs and generative models through a single endpoint

use_cases.title: Everyday Coding Accelerator
use_cases.description: Speed up daily development by using AI to autocomplete functions, write boilerplate, generate tests and explain unfamiliar snippets directly inside your IDE.

use_cases.title: Understanding Large Codebases
use_cases.description: Use search and agents to navigate, summarise and document legacy or complex codebases, helping new team members ramp up faster.

use_cases.title: Embedding AI into Developer Tools
use_cases.description: Integrate the Blackbox AI API into internal platforms, CLIs or dashboards to automate code review, migration scripts and repetitive engineering workflows.

pricing: Free tier available — paid plans start at around $5–$10/month depending on promotions.

information.label: Privacy
information.value: Enterprise-focused; advertises enterprise-grade security and privacy controls

information.label: API
information.value: Available — multi-agent and task APIs for integrating AI into products

name: DeepSite
description:
DeepSite is an AI-powered website builder that transforms natural language prompts into live, editable front-end code.

Built as an open-source project on Hugging Face Spaces and powered by DeepSeek models, DeepSite generates responsive HTML, CSS and JavaScript from simple instructions such as “a landing page for a SaaS analytics tool with pricing and testimonials.”

Because it outputs real code, creators can export, tweak and host the generated sites anywhere, making DeepSite ideal for rapid prototyping, learning front-end patterns, and shipping small projects without heavy tooling.
subtitle: Open-source AI tool that turns prompts into live, editable websites.
features: Generate live, runnable web pages from short natural language briefs
Produces readable HTML, CSS and JavaScript that can be exported or extended
Supports iterative refinement so you can adjust sections, components or styles via prompts
Open-source and hosted on Hugging Face Spaces with community-driven improvements
Great for learning front-end by inspecting AI-generated layouts and patterns

use_cases.title: Marketing & Landing Pages
use_cases.description: Non-technical founders and marketers can spin up landing pages for new products or campaigns by describing the structure and content they want.

use_cases.title: Developer Prototyping
use_cases.description: Engineers can quickly prototype layout ideas, copy sections into existing projects, or use DeepSite as a starting point instead of coding from a blank file.

use_cases.title: Teaching & Learning Front-end
use_cases.description: Students can experiment with prompts, then inspect the generated code to understand how different layouts and components are implemented.

pricing: Free to use as an open-source Hugging Face Space (usage subject to platform limits).

information.label: Privacy
information.value: Runs via Hugging Face infrastructure — see Hugging Face privacy policy

information.label: API
information.value: No dedicated hosted API; can be self-hosted or extended from open-source code

name: Midjourney
description:
Midjourney is a high-end generative image model and subscription service developed by Midjourney, Inc. It turns natural language prompts into detailed, stylised images suitable for concept art, product visuals and storytelling.

Running primarily through Discord and its own web interface, Midjourney offers powerful controls for style, aspect ratio, variations, upscaling and now short video animations. Creators can explore anything from painterly illustration to photorealism while drawing inspiration from a large community feed.

Thanks to its quality and unique aesthetic, Midjourney has become a go-to tool for designers, agencies, indie creators and studios who need rapid visual exploration and moodboarding.
subtitle: Premium AI image generation for art, concepts and visual exploration.
features: Text-to-image generation with support for many artistic styles and levels of realism
Advanced controls for aspect ratios, seeds, variations, remixing and tiling
High-quality upscaling and refinement for production-ready visuals
Community showcase, prompt inspiration and remix culture built into the platform
New video generation and animation features for bringing stills to life

use_cases.title: Concept Art & Worldbuilding
use_cases.description: Artists, writers and game designers can explore characters, environments and props visually at high speed, iterating through many concepts before committing.

use_cases.title: Brand & Campaign Moodboards
use_cases.description: Creative teams use Midjourney to generate moodboards, hero imagery and style explorations for pitches, campaigns and brand refreshes.

use_cases.title: Illustrations for Content
use_cases.description: Bloggers, educators and marketers create bespoke illustrations and cover images that better match their stories than generic stock photos.

pricing: Subscription only — plans start at around $10/month with higher tiers for heavier usage.

information.label: Privacy
information.value: Subscription service with its own content, IP and privacy policies

information.label: API
information.value: No fully public REST API; primarily accessed via Discord bot and web app

name: DALL-E 3
description:
DALL·E 3 is OpenAI’s third-generation text-to-image model, designed to understand nuanced prompts and generate coherent, detailed images.

Integrated directly into ChatGPT and available via the OpenAI API, DALL·E 3 can create illustrations, diagrams, concept art and product visuals from natural language descriptions. It is especially strong at following complex instructions and rendering readable text within images.

With robust safety filters and content policies, DALL·E 3 is widely used by educators, marketers, product teams and individual creators who want fast, controllable visuals without needing dedicated design tools.
subtitle: OpenAI’s advanced text-to-image model integrated with ChatGPT and the API.
features: High-fidelity text-to-image generation with strong prompt adherence
Deep integration with ChatGPT for conversational prompt refinement and editing
Inpainting and outpainting capabilities for editing and extending existing images
Safety mitigations around public figures and sensitive content
Available via the OpenAI API for programmatic image workflows

use_cases.title: Educational Diagrams & Illustrations
use_cases.description: Teachers and students can create clear diagrams, infographics and visual explanations to support lessons, presentations and study materials.

use_cases.title: Marketing & Product Visuals
use_cases.description: Marketers generate ad concepts, social media graphics and product scenarios for campaigns without relying solely on stock imagery.

use_cases.title: Prototyping UX & Product Ideas
use_cases.description: Product teams quickly visualise interface ideas, physical product concepts or service scenarios to align stakeholders before full design work begins.

pricing: Available via ChatGPT (including Plus/Team/Pro plans) and pay-per-image OpenAI API pricing.

information.label: Privacy
information.value: Follows OpenAI’s data usage and safety policies

information.label: API
information.value: Available — accessible through the OpenAI API and ChatGPT integrations

name: Canva
description:
Canva is a popular browser-based design suite that combines drag-and-drop editing with AI features like image generation, layout suggestions and copy assistance.

Users can start from thousands of templates for social posts, presentations, documents, resumes and more, then enhance them using AI tools such as Text to Image, Magic Media and Magic Design.

Because it’s built for non-designers as well as professionals, Canva has become a staple for individuals, teams and organisations that need fast, on-brand visuals without complex design software.
subtitle: All-in-one design platform with integrated AI for images, layouts and content.
features: Huge library of templates for social posts, presentations, documents and print
AI image generator (Text to Image) and Magic Media tools for creating visuals
Magic Design suggestions that automatically produce layouts from content
Brand Kits, collaboration tools and shared libraries for teams
One-click resizing and export options for multiple channels and formats

use_cases.title: Social Media & Marketing Graphics
use_cases.description: Create consistent, on-brand social posts, ads, thumbnails and banners using templates and AI-generated visuals.

use_cases.title: Presentations & Internal Docs
use_cases.description: Teams build polished slide decks, reports and internal documents with drag-and-drop layouts and AI-assisted content.

use_cases.title: Resumes, Flyers & Everyday Design
use_cases.description: Individuals design CVs, posters, invitations and business collateral without needing traditional design software.

pricing: Free plan available — Canva Pro and Business plans typically start around $10–$15/user/month.

information.label: Type
information.value: Online design and publishing platform with AI features

information.label: Privacy
information.value: Offers detailed privacy and security documentation for individuals and enterprises

information.label: API
information.value: Developer platform and integrations available for embedding Canva into other workflows

name: Playground
description:
Playground is a browser-based AI design studio that makes it easy to create and edit images with prompts, presets and intuitive editing tools.

Positioned as a creative alternative to tools like Canva, Playground offers style presets, templates and powerful editing controls for inpainting, background changes and adjustments. Users can iterate on visuals until they match a specific aesthetic or brand.

It’s aimed at creators, marketers and small businesses who want fast, flexible image generation without deep design skills, while still allowing fine-grained control when needed.
subtitle: Prompt-based design studio for generating and editing images with AI.
features: Text-to-image generation with multiple styles and presets
Template-driven workflows for common formats like posters, logos and social content
AI-powered editing tools for background removal, inpainting and variations
Layered editing interface for fine control over compositions
Web-based workspace that keeps projects and assets in one place

use_cases.title: Brand & Social Visuals
use_cases.description: Creators and marketers generate on-brand social posts, ad creatives and hero images with style presets and templates.

use_cases.title: Product & E-commerce Imagery
use_cases.description: Small businesses create product visuals, lifestyle scenes and promotional graphics without expensive photoshoots.

use_cases.title: Creative Exploration & Experiments
use_cases.description: Artists and hobbyists experiment with AI styles, remix prompts and refine images for personal projects or inspiration boards.

pricing: Freemium — core features are free with paid tiers for higher limits and advanced capabilities.

information.label: Type
information.value: AI-powered design and image editing platform

information.label: Privacy
information.value: Operates as a hosted SaaS product with its own privacy policy

information.label: API
information.value: No widely-advertised public REST API; focused on the web app experience

name: Leonardo
description:
Leonardo.Ai is a creative suite for generating images, game assets and video content using a collection of powerful AI models.

It offers token-based plans, custom model training, style presets and workflows tailored for production use. Creators can maintain consistent characters, scenes and branding across large volumes of assets, making Leonardo popular with game studios, marketers and independent creators.

Beyond the web app, Leonardo provides an API for developers who want to automate asset generation or build AI-powered features into their own tools and pipelines.
subtitle: AI image and video generation platform built for consistent, production-ready assets.
features: Multiple image and video models with style presets for different aesthetics
Token-based generation with daily or monthly allowances depending on plan
Custom model training and fine-tuning for brand- or project-specific styles
Tools for upscaling, background removal and batch asset creation
Production-ready API for integrating Leonardo into pipelines and applications

use_cases.title: Game & Interactive Asset Creation
use_cases.description: Game studios and indie developers generate characters, props, environments and UI elements while maintaining a consistent art direction.

use_cases.title: Marketing & Creative Teams
use_cases.description: Agencies and marketing teams create campaign visuals, variations and storyboards at scale, using custom styles to stay on brand.

use_cases.title: Automated Asset Pipelines
use_cases.description: Developers use the API to build internal tools that automatically generate, upscale or adapt imagery for products and experiences.

pricing: Free plan available — paid plans and API access start at roughly $10–$12/month with higher tiers for heavy use.

information.label: Type
information.value: AI art, asset and video generation platform

information.label: Privacy
information.value: Commercial SaaS platform with documented security and data handling policies

information.label: API
information.value: Available — production API with key-based access and separate plans

name: QuillBot
description:
QuillBot is an AI-powered writing assistant best known for its paraphrasing tool, which helps users rephrase, clarify and improve text while preserving meaning.

It also includes grammar checking, summarisation, citation assistance and tone controls, making it useful for students, academics, professionals and non-native speakers. QuillBot is available via the web, browser extensions and integrations with tools like Word.

By focusing on improving existing writing rather than generating entire documents from scratch, QuillBot is often used alongside other tools to tighten, clarify and professionalise drafts.
subtitle: AI paraphrasing and editing suite for clearer, more polished writing.
features: Multiple paraphrasing modes to adjust clarity, fluency, tone and creativity
Built-in grammar, spelling and punctuation checking
Summariser for condensing articles, papers and long-form content
Citation and research helpers for academic writing
Browser extensions and document integrations for in-place editing

use_cases.title: Academic & Essay Rewriting
use_cases.description: Students and researchers refine paragraphs for clarity and coherence while reducing repetition and improving tone.

use_cases.title: Professional & Business Writing
use_cases.description: Professionals polish emails, reports and proposals so they read clearly and confidently with minimal manual editing.

use_cases.title: ESL & Non-Native Writer Support
use_cases.description: Non-native speakers use QuillBot to improve fluency, fix grammar and better match expected tone in academic or professional contexts.

pricing: Free plan available — Premium starts at $19.95/month, with significant discounts on annual billing.

information.label: Type
information.value: AI paraphrasing and writing enhancement platform

information.label: Privacy
information.value: Cloud-based service with documented data handling and education-focused safeguards

information.label: API
information.value: No official public API — primarily offered via web app, browser extensions and editor integrations

name: Scribe
description: Scribe records digital workflows and auto-creates illustrated guides. It’s perfect for training, documentation and onboarding with minimal manual effort.

name: Scholarcy
description: Scholarcy summarises academic papers and highlights key arguments, making research digestion faster for students and professionals alike.

name: Paperpal
description: Paperpal helps researchers and writers improve language, clarity and formatting in manuscripts using AI-driven editing and style feedback.

name: Wordtune
description: Wordtune rewrites and improves text to sound natural, concise, and engaging. It allows the user to adapt tone for emails, reports, essays and blogs.

name: AlphaSense
description: AlphaSense enables professionals to analyse corporate data, reports and transcripts using semantic search. It reveals market insights and trends through natural-language understanding.

name: Numer AI
description: Numer AI crowdsources machine-learning models for stock prediction, allowing data scientists to contribute models that compete on real financial data.

name: Datarails
description: Datarails automates financial planning and reporting by integrating spreadsheets with real-time data insights. Helping finance professionals make faster, data-driven decisions.

name: Workiva
description: Workiva streamlines corporate compliance, reporting and audit processes through AI-powered automation and collaboration tools for large organisations.

name: Zeta Alpha
description: Zeta Alpha provides enterprise knowledge search powered by AI, surfacing insights from unstructured corporate data and research repositories.

name: Khanmigo
description: Khanmigo is a personalised AI tutor guiding students through lessons, problem-solving and writing exercises with real-time feedback and encouragement.

name: MindGrasp
description: MindGrasp turns videos, lectures and documents into concise notes and summaries. Helping learners retain key information more effectively.

name: OpenRead
description: OpenRead provides AI-powered comprehension tools for reading and analysing study materials. Making complex topics easier to understand.

name: Explainpaper
description: Explainpaper translates dense academic text into plain language, helping researchers and students grasp scientific papers quickly.

name: Elicit
description: Elicit automates research discovery and synthesis by generating hypotheses, summarising studies and suggesting related work.

name: AlphaFold
description: AlphaFold predicts 3D protein structures from amino acid sequences, transforming biological research and accelerating drug discovery.

name: SciSpace
description: SciSpace helps users read, summarise and explore academic papers... through AI explanations, visualisations and semantic linking.

name: labguru
description: Labguru automates lab workflows... from experiment tracking to inventory and data analysis. It esures efficient scientific collaboration.

name: Pinecone AI
description: Pinecone AI offers a vector-database for semantic search and retrieval. Foundational for LLMs, recommendation engines and AI research.

name: GPTexcel
description: GPTexcel automates spreadsheet tasks like formula creation, chart building and data summarisation using natural language prompts.

name: DataGPT
description: DataGPT lets users chat directly with their data. Generating visual reports and insights automatically through AI analysis.

name: Arcwise
description: Arcwise simplifies data manipulation by transforming plain-English instructions into spreadsheet actions and advanced formulas.

name: Google Workspace
description: Google Workspace integrates AI across Docs, Sheets and Slides to enhance collaboration, automate workflows and boost productivity.

name: formulabot
description: Formulabot translates user requests into spreadsheet formulas instantly. Allowing non-technical users to automate complex data tasks seamlessly.

name: Grammarly AI
description: Grammarly AI improves writing clarity, tone and correctness in real-time. Offering stylistic and structural suggestions tailored to the writer’s intent.

name: Writer
description: Writer empowers teams to create brand-consistent content with tone, terminology and grammar guidance powered by enterprise AI.

name: Copysmith
description: Copysmith generates marketing copy, ads and product descriptions quickly. Allowing marketers to scale content creation with consistent messaging.

name: Hyperwrite
description: Hyperwrite acts as a personal writing companion. Assisting with brainstorming, drafting and improving text while adapting to your voice.

name: Inkforall
description: Inkforall combines SEO optimisation with AI-assisted content creation. Helping writers produce high-ranking, engaging material for blogs and websites.

name: MindLuster
description: MindLuster offers an extensive collection of free online courses in various subjects. Allowing learners to build skills and earn certificates.

name: React Bits
description: React Bits provides reusable animated UI components for React developers. Helping to build visually dynamic and responsive interfaces quickly.

name: Wondershare
description: Wondershare provides an ecosystem of creative software for editing, file management and publishing. Supporting digital creators and professionals.

name: Code Beautify
description: Code Beautify hosts online tools for formatting, validating and converting code and data. Simplifying debugging and data cleaning processes.
10015 is a hub of free online tools for text, images and development tasks. Offering all-in-one convenience for quick productivity.

name: Paperanimator
description: Paperanimator allows artists to draw frame-by-frame animations in a digital format. Blending traditional creativity with AI assistance.

name: TinyWow
description: TinyWow offers free browser-based utilities for document editing, image optimisation and quick file conversion. All powered by AI.

name: Natively
description: Natively helps developers create high-performance web applications with native functionality using modern build frameworks.

name: Learn Anything
description: Learn Anything maps interconnected learning paths across topics. Helping users plan efficient routes to mastery through visual knowledge graphs.

name: Higgsfield
description: Higgsfield applies AI to data science workflows. Automating technical analysis, visualisation and predictive modelling.

name: AnimeJS
description: AnimeJS is a lightweight JavaScript animation engine. Letting developers build rich, interactive motion effects with simple syntax.

name: Gambo AI
description: Gambo AI helps designers and marketers create high-quality visual assets. Supporting branding, advertising and storytelling projects.

name: Jitter
description: Jitter is a motion design tool for creating smooth UI animations and short video content. Perfect for digital designers and creators.

name: Emergent
description: Emergent integrates AI tools for coding, planning and team automation. Helping users streamline development workflows efficiently.

name: InterviewAI
description: InterviewAI simulates interview scenarios with realistic questions and feedback. Helping users practice and improve performance before real interviews.

name: LogoDiffusion
description: LogoDiffusion generates unique brand logos using AI diffusion models. Allowing users to design professional visuals instantly.

name: Anara
description: Anara provides AI-powered creative collaboration tools that assist designers and teams in producing cohesive branding and visual projects.

name: Claid
description: Claid enhances and generates visual content using AI. Perfect for image editing, upscaling and creative automation.

name: HireFlow
description: HireFlow streamlines recruitment by automating candidate sourcing, outreach and evaluation. Helping companies and applicants connect faster.

name: eve
description: Designed for plaintiff-law firms. A legal-AI platform you can train and teach to assist with case intake, litigation workflows and document drafting throughout an entire case lifecycle.

name: Spellbook
description: Spellbook is an AI tool specialised for contract review and drafting, built on top of legal-language models. It helps transactional lawyers quickly analyse, draft and benchmark contract language worldwide.

name: PQAI
description: PQAI is an open-source AI prior-art search tool for inventors and researchers. It accepts plain-language invention descriptions and finds relevant patents and literature to improve patent quality.

name: Granola
description: Granola is an AI-powered meeting notepad that transcribes, summarises and extracts actionable insights from back-to-back meetings. It integrates into work processes and aids follow-ups.

name: n8n
description: n8n is a visual automation/workflow platform that allows you to build AI agents and integrate them with 400+ apps to perform automated tasks. NO code required!

name: Make
description: Make (previously Integromat) is a no-code automation platform. Enabling users to build, orchestrate and scale AI-powered workflows and agents across business functions.

name: Zapier
description: Zapier is a widely-used automation platform that heavily integrates AI to connect apps, build agent and automate tasks across thousands of services with minimal code.

name: Boomi
description: Boomi is an enterprise integration and automation platform offering AI-agents and workflows to streamline API/data management, process automation, and integration across systems.

name: Lovable
description: Lovable is an AI platform that lets users build web apps and websites via natural-language prompts. Simplifying front-end & full-stack development for non-technical users.

name: ATLAS
description: ATLAS is an AI store-builder tool that custom-generates Shopify and e-commerce stores. Design, copy, create product photos and themes via AI from product links.

name: Base 44
description: Base44 is a platform that converts natural-language prompts into fully functional apps. No code needed! Ideal for creating dashboards, onboarding portals or internal tools rapidly.

name: HeyGen
description: HeyGen is a generative video/AI avatar platform. Allowing users to create AI-driven video avatars and narration from text, enabling quick production of human-like video content without filming.

name: Artlist
description: Artlist.io is an AI-enhanced media platform offering royalty-free music, sound effects and AI tools for content creators to generate media assets.

name: Precision
description: Precision offers AI-driven financial modelling and analytics. Helping businesses and teams visualise data to forecast KPI's, simulate scenarios and make data-driven investment decisions.

name: Fyxer
description: Fyxer is an AI-enabled tool that connects to your inbox, drafts replies in your voice, takes meeting notes and automates follow-ups from your calendar and email.

name: Similar Web
description: SimilarWeb is a web analytics platform using AI to provide competitive insights, web traffic data and market intelligence for creators and businesses. Allowing you to comoare your websites performance to direct competitors.

name: PopAI
description: PopAI provides creators with generative AI workflows to produce content (blogs, social posts, videos etc.) at scale. Enabling faster ideation and production cycles.

name: Buddy Pro
description: BuddyPro AI acts as a personal AI assistant for professionals. Automating tasks like note-taking, follow-ups, content drafting and meeting summarisation to free up time.

name: VAPI
description: VAPI is a voice-agent platform that enables developers to build and deploy conversational voice agents at scale with low latency and enterprise reliability.

name: Codiga
description: Codiga checks your code for mistakes and helps improve quality as you write. It gives suggestions inside your editor so you can write cleaner, safer code.

name: DeepSeek
description: DeepSeek is an AI assistant built to handle long, detailed questions. It can read files, explain topics and help with research while being fast and affordable to use.

name: Grok
description: Grok is an AI assistant designed to give quick, real-time answers using information from the web. It’s helpful for staying updated, writing content and even doing light coding tasks.

name: Beautiful.AI
description: Beautiful.AI creates clean, well-designed presentation slides automatically. You type the content, it formats everything professionally with smart layouts.

name: Pitch
description: Pitch is a modern presentation tool for teams. It makes it easy to create slides, share ideas, add visuals and work together in real time.

name: Plus
description: Plus AI helps you create full PowerPoint or Google Slides presentations using simple prompts. It designs layouts, adds visuals and builds complete decks automatically.

name: AskCodi
description: AskCodi helps developers by turning everyday questions into code snippets or useful explanations. It’s helpful for beginners learning to code or developers working faster.

name: Cursor
description: Cursor is a code editor enhanced with built-in AI assistance. It helps developers write, fix, and understand code directly inside the editor, making programming faster and easier for beginners and professionals.

name: Replit
description: Replit is an online coding environment where you can build, run, and deploy software from your browser. Its AI tools help generate code, explain errors, and speed up development.

name: Tabnine
description: Tabnine is an AI coding assistant that suggests code completions as you type. It learns from your coding style to offer personal, accurate suggestions.

name: Friday
description: Friday.ai creates weekly reports by pulling updates from tools you already use. It automatically summarises progress, tasks, and blockers for teams.

name: Mailmaestro
description: MailMaestro writes personalised emails using AI. You choose the tone, message and details. It generates clean professional emails ready to send.

name: Shortwave
description: Shortwave is an AI-powered email inbox that summarises messages, drafts replies and helps users stay organised with faster email workflows.

name: Superhuman
description: Superhuman is a fast, AI-enhanced email client designed to help busy professionals process inboxes quickly, draft messages, and organise tasks efficiently.

name: Adobe Firefly
description: Adobe Firefly creates images, graphics and design elements using text prompts. It focuses on clean, high-quality visuals with strong brand-safe controls.

name: FLUX.1
description: FLUX.1 is an AI image generator known for producing bold, artistic visuals with rich detail. Built for designers who want more creative control.

name: Ideogram
description: Ideogram generates images and typography with accurate text rendering, making it ideal for posters, logos, and social graphics.

name: Recraft
description: Recraft creates vectors, icons, patterns and illustrations using AI. Geared toward graphic designers needing consistent brand-ready assets.

name: Openart
description: OpenArt lets users generate, explore, and fine-tune AI images. Optimised for creators experimenting with different styles and models.

name: Bricks
description: Bricks generates websites using simple prompts and visual tools. Users can design pages, layouts and components without needing to code.

name: Gigasheet
description: Gigasheet lets users analyse huge datasets without the need of spreadsheets or coding. Upload a file and explore it instantly with AI-powered insights.

name: Rows AI
description: Rows AI integrates AI formulas into spreadsheets. Helping users automate reports, research and data tasks directly inside a spreadsheet interface.

name: SheetAI
description: SheetAI adds AI functions to Google Sheets so users can summarise text, generate content and automate tasks using simple formulas.

name: Avoma
description: Avoma records meetings and turns them into summaries, action items and searchable notes. Helping teams stay aligned without manual note-taking.

name: Equal Time
description: Equal Time tracks who is speaking in meetings and uses AI to show participation patterns. Helping improve team communication and inclusivity.

name: Fathom
description: Fathom transcribes calls and automatically highlights important moments. Giving users instant summaries for customer, team or sales conversations.

name: Fellow
description: Fellow helps teams run organised meetings with shared agendas, notes, feedback tools, and AI-generated summaries of discussions.

name: Fireflies
description: Fireflies records meetings, transcribes them and extracts tasks and insights. Helping teams review conversations without rewatching calls.

name: Krisp
description: Krisp removes background noise and echoes from calls. It helps users sound clear and professional during meetings or recordings.

name: Otter
description: Otter transcribes meetings and classrooms in real time. Producing clean notes, speaker highlights and summaries automatically.

name: Integrately
description: Integrately lets users connect apps and automate workflows in one click. It includes thousands of ready-made automation templates for you to explore.

name: Squirro
description: Squirro uses AI to analyse enterprise data and surface insights for business teams. Helping guide decisions and identify opportunities.

name: HPE
description: HPE offers enterprise-grade AI infrastructure and automation tools that help organisations train models, analyse data and run AI workloads at scale.

name: Exalate
description: Exalate helps teams sync data between platforms like Jira, ServiceNow, Salesforce and GitHub with automated, bi-directional updates.

name: Suse
description: Suse AI supports enterprise development and infrastructure through open-source tools. Helping teams deploy, manage and secure AI workloads.

name: Teachmate AI
description: Teachmate AI helps teachers create lesson plans, worksheets and classroom materials quickly using simple prompts.

name: AmpCode
description: AmpCode turns text prompts into working websites and apps. Helping beginners and teams create software without needing deep coding experience.

name: Monday
description: Monday.com uses AI to automate tasks, summarise updates and organise teamwork across projects and workflows.

name: Wrike
description: Wrike offers AI-powered project management features. Including task suggestions, summaries and automated organisation for teams.

name: Jotform
description: Jotform uses AI to help users build forms, surveys, and reports quickly, making data collection simple for any skill level.

name: JustDone
description: JustDone provides AI tools for writing, researching, and generating content, making it easy to produce articles, emails, and ideas quickly.

name: Jasper
description: Jasper helps businesses create marketing and brand content such as social posts, ads and long-form writing. With strong tools for tone and style.

name: MailChimp
description: MailChimp uses AI to create emails, subject lines and campaigns that improve engagement. It also helps users manage contacts and track performance.

name: SlidesGo
description: SlidesGo offers a large collection of ready-made slide templates for school, work or creative projects. It makes presentation design fast and easy for beginners.

name: Clippit
description: Clippit turns long videos into short clips by automatically trimming highlights, identifying key moments and producing ready-to-share content.
